# Java

```java

import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;

public class Main {
	static boolean[] c;
	static int[] s;
	static int k;

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

		while (true) {
			k = sc.nextInt();

			if (k == 0) {
				break;
			}
			s = new int[k];
			c = new boolean[k];

			for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
				s[i] = sc.nextInt();
			}

			go(0, 0);
			System.out.println();
		}
	}

	private static void go(int index, int zz) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if (index == 6) {

			for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
				if (c[i]) {
					System.out.print(s[i] + " ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
			return;
		}

		for (int i = zz; i < k; i++) {

			c[i] = true;
			go(index + 1, i + 1);
			c[i] = false;
		}
	}

}


```
